greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of the denominators of the coefficients [x^k] P(n,x) defined in A141904.
mathematica: ClearAll[u, p]; u[n_] := (-1)^n/(2*n + 1); p[0][x_] := u[0]; p[n_][x_] := p[n][x] = u[n] + x*Sum[u[i]*p[n - i - 1][x] , {i, 0, n-1}] // Expand; row[n_] := CoefficientList[ p[n][x], x]; Table[row[n], {n, 0, 10}] // Flatten // Denominator (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 02 2012 *)
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Sep 14 2008
ext: Edited and extended by _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 24 2009
